briefTitle: IDA-01 A Randomised, Open-Label, Comparative Study of Intravenous Iron Isomaltoside 1000 (Monofer®) and Iron Sucrose
officialTitle: A Phase III, Randomised, Open-Label, Comparative Study of Intravenous Iron Isomaltoside 1000 (Monofer®) and Iron Sucrose in Subjects With Iron Deficiency Anaemia and Who Are Intolerant or Unresponsive to Oral Iron Therapy or Who Need Iron Rapidly (PROVIDE)
summary: The purpose of the trial is to evaluate and compare the effect of iron isomaltoside 1000 to iron sucrose in its ability to increase haemoglobin (Hb) in subjects with IDA when oral iron preparations are ineffective or cannot be used or where there is a clinical need to deliver iron rapidly.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Subjects With an Haemoglobin (Hb) Increase of ≥ 2 g/dL From Baseline at Any Time From Week 1 to Week 5
